main event: Observers reported seeing a bright orange object that changed to bright red and remained in the same position in Othello, Washington.
interesting points: The object was described as cigar-shaped and emitted a whirring sound,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes, and the object was estimated to be about 10,000 feet in the sky.,Witnesses included members of the 637 Radar Squadron based in Othello.,There was no physical evidence found,The observers reported the sky was clear with a full moon at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright orange to red object
